bibl.title: Recognizing Greek Literacy in Early Roman Documents from the Judaean Desert.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Literacy by numbers? - Masada. - Aural literacy and bilingualism. - The Babatha and Salome Komaïse archives. - The Bar Kokhba archive [text, translation and commentary of P. Yadin II, 52]. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Scott D. Charlesworth, Recognizing Greek Literacy in Early Roman Documents from the Judaean Desert.
